priority.description: This stub mapping's priority relative to others. 1 is highest.

persistent.description: Indicates that the stub mapping should be persisted immediately on create/update/delete and survive resets to default.

scenarioName.descrption: The name of the scenario that this stub mapping is part of

requiredScenarioState.descrption: The required state of the scenario in order for this stub to be matched.

newScenarioState.descrption: The new state for the scenario to be updated to after this stub is served.

postServeActions.descrption: A map of the names of post serve action extensions to trigger and their parameters.
